puzzle.help: 1. Divide the board in 'L'-shaped figures, with one cell wide 'legs'. 2. Every symbol on the board represents the corner of an L. there are no hidden L's. 3. A = symbol tells you that the legs have equal length. 4. A â‰ symbol tells you that the legs have different lengths. 5. A ? symbol tells you that the legs could have different lengths or equal length.
